Trade/Device Name(s): LIAISON PLEX Yeast Blood Culture Assay
LIAISON PLEX® Yeast Blood Culture Assay
Regulation Name(s): Multiplex Nucleic Acid Assay For Identification Of Microorganisms And Resistance Markers From Positive Blood Cultures
Specimen Container(s): Blood culture bottle (from BacT/Alert, BACTEC, VersaTREK systems)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for LIAISON PLEX Yeast Blood Culture Assay, a multiplex PCR and microarray-based test for rapid detection and identification of fungal organisms from positive blood cultures
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative multiplex nucleic acid in vitro diagnostic assay on LIAISON PLEX System for simultaneous detection and identification of multiple potentially pathogenic fungal organisms in positive blood culture samples, performed directly from blood culture bottles flagged positive by automated systems and containing fungal organisms determined by Gram stain; results used to aid diagnosis of bloodstream infection in conjunction with other clinical information.
